description: Greek inspired lamb meatballs are packed with flavour in this simple salad, perfect for summer evenings.
name: GreekStyle Lamb Meatball Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium red onion, peeled and finely sliced
4 heads little gem lettuce, finely sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Place the beef mince, oregano, garlic and lemon zest in a bowl and mix well. Roll into 20 meatballs and set aside.
Place the feta, lemon juice and yoghurt in a blender with a tablespoon or so of water and blend until smooth, adding more water if necessary to get a dressing consistency.
Heat the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the meatballs, stirring often, for 10 minutes or until cooked through.
Toss the red onion, cucumber, olives and lettuce together in a bowl. Divide between 4 plates and top with meatballs and a drizzle of feta dressing.
